mutf8.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual mutf8.h(7)

NAME

mutf8.h — UTF-8 data structure, constants and routines

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <mutf8.h>

enum {

mjo_utf8_max_octets
,
mjo_utf8_replacement
};

struct mjo_utf8 {

int m_valid ;
uint8_t char m_block [mjo_utf8_max_octets ];
unsigned int m_nil ;
size_t m_octets ;
};


int
mjo_utf8_compose(enum mjo_status *const, unsigned char const **const, struct mjo_utf8 *const, unsigned char const *);

int
mjo_utf8_is_punctuation(int *const, struct mjo_utf8 const *const);

int
mjo_utf8_is_quote(int *const, struct mjo_utf8 const *const);

int
mjo_utf8_is_whitespace(int *const, struct mjo_utf8 const *const);

void
mjo_utf8_strchr(unsigned char const *, struct mjo_utf8 const *const);

INCLUDES

<mstdio.h>
<mstddef.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides UTF-8 character data structure, constants and routines.

enum

mjo_utf8_max_octets maximum number of octets that can comprise an UTF-8 character
mjo_utf8_replacement UTF-8 replacement sequence for an invalid character

struct mjo_utf8

m_valid indicator if the buffer is valid
m_block buffer to hold a single UTF-8 character
m_nil buffer terminator and padding (always 0)
m_octets number of octets comprising the UTF-8 character

When m_valid is false, m_block shall contain the offending octet and m_octets shall be set to one (1).

SEE ALSO

mjo_utf8_compose(3), mjo_utf8_is_punctuation(3), mjo_utf8_is_quote(3), mjo_utf8_is_whitespace(3), mjo_utf8_strchr(3)
